job.title: Software Engineer, New Grad (Backend, Full-stack, & ML)
job.description:
At Instabase
, we're passionate about building software to advance the state of the art in computing. We've built a fearlessly experimental, customer-obsessed team who are making discoveries to fundamentally change how people build and consume business applications.
Today, we're partnering with the world's leading companies to transform how they use data and technology. If these challenges excite you, we'd love to hear from you!
Our Engineering Team
architects the underlying operating system, core services, platform infrastructure, dev toolkits, core algorithms, machine learning models, packaged end-user apps, and app store marketplace. Instabase engineers are excited to solve hard problems for complex organizations and are self-starters from day one.
Our Tech Stack
is React and Typescript on the frontend. Our product and infrastructure is written in Go, Python, Java, and C++. We operate using the micro-services model and leverage Docker and Kubernetes for our deployments.
We're hiring across all teams and technical areas!
This includes Frontend, Product/Full-Stack, Systems, Infrastructure, Machine Learning and AI!
Interested in learning more? Explore the
Instabase
product
and read about the
Intern experience
here
.
